metadata.name: Blue Topaz
metadata.description:
This NFT represents a real gemstone.

Topaz is one of the hardest naturally occurring minerals and is found in many places in the world. Ancient Sri Lanka exported topazes to Greece and Egypt, which led to the etymologically related names of the island by Alexander Polyhistor (Topazius) and the early Egyptians (Topapwene) â€“ "land of the Topaz".

 - The image is of the actual blue Topaz.
